title: 'Boys and Girl - Week 4 Browns Preview; Secondary Problems; 'Bobby Calls BS'
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Week 4 Browns Preview; Secondary Problems; 'Bobby Calls BS'
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane is back with Bobby and they tackle the problems the Cowboys are having in the secondary. Also, Marc Sessler from the Around the NFL Podcast stops by to preview the Browns game. Also, they debut a new segment: Bobby Calls BS. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
